characterDescription: Ishikk is a Purelaker, first and foremost. He is also (naturally) a fisherman. He is quite fond of a woman named Maib but isn't ready to settle down, so he often gives her fish as gifts so that she can't 'catch him'.

characterDetails.Appearance: Ishikk wore lake sandals on his submerged feet, a pair of knee-length breeches, and was shirtless. (Purelakers never cover their shoulders when the sun is shining.)
characterDetails.Characteristics:
Most nights he does just fine sleeping on his raft.
He'd never been good with other languages.
